member.name: M:BoneworksModdingToolkit.AssetBundles.LoadBundle(System.String,UnityEngine.AssetBundle@)
member.summary: Loads the given bundle from UserData\AssetBundles
member.returns: True if the bundle was successfully loaded

member.name: M:BoneworksModdingToolkit.BoneHook.CustomHooks.CreateHook(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Hook onto any method in the game.
member.param: The method you want to hook.
Your hook method. Should be static.

member.name: M:BoneworksModdingToolkit.Shaders.ReplaceDummyShaders(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Replaces dummy shaders on the object with in-game equivalents and missing shaders with Valve/vr_standard.

member.name: M:BoneworksModdingToolkit.Shaders.ReplaceWithValveVRStandard(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Replaces all shaders on the object with Valve/vr_standard to make it visible in both eyes.

member.summary: Prefab should be a unique instance of the object. You need to switch levels for new items to show up.
